title: CryptoHeadlineNews
author: CryptoHeadlineNews
created_time: April 19, 2023, 08:34:58 AMLast edit: April 19, 2023, 08:52:52 AM by CryptoHeadlineNews
content: Due to the recent use of A.I in assisting man's job, it just came to my mind this morning that what if I try to ask ChatGPT about which club is liken to win the premier league match this season and this is what I got shown down below..So what are your say on this, is ChatGPT right or wrong on the 3 clubs it suggested and the reasons given below??Because by this A.I, you could see it chose "Manchester City" as the first club likely to win the league this season, while, Liverpool stand as the Second club likely to win the league, and Manchester United stands as the third club likely to win the league this season.So what are your thoughts on this, do you agree with ChatGPT or not??

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Stupid answer.Unbelievable that ChatGPT did not mention Erling Haaland when mentioning some Manchester City players as world class players.I am surprised not to see Arsenal among. Who is Manchester United and Liverpool this season when talking about Arsenal to win the league? The clubs are not just to be compared with Arsenal. Only Manchester City is mainly competing with Arsenal. Who to win 2022/2023 EPL: Arsenal or Manchester City.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on April 19, 2023, 08:44:18 AMStupid answer.Unbelievable that ChatGPT did not mention Erling Haaland when mentioning some Manchester City players as world class players.Lol I was going to say this.I think ChatGPT are collecting past and present information because they mentioned Manchester City and Liverpool as the candidate, both of them were top 1 and 2 in the last season. They didn't mention Haaland because Haaland was joined Manchester City in this season, Mahrez and Kevin De Bruyne were carried Manchester City in the last year. They didn't mention Sterling because he already joined Chelsea.And Manchester United are the present information because they are comeback after Ronaldo was terminated.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: It looks like that app needs some update as Liverpool is out of any competition during this year and Manchester United only lately recovered to be in the top spots of the Premier League but still having no chances of winning this league at all.I don't see anything related to Arsenal in that answer and as far as I know Arsenal is still leading the Premier League with 4 points difference to Manchester City who they have a direct match against them.I think ChatGPT and all other apps that rely on it like Nova which I have on my Android phone are just virtual assistant without any real intelligence in predicting the future as predicting the future is impossible.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.created_time: April 19, 2023, 09:41:24 AMLast edit: April 19, 2023, 10:07:27 AM by Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on April 19, 2023, 09:16:06 AMLol I was going to say this.I think ChatGPT are collecting past and present information because they mentioned Manchester City and Liverpool as the candidate, both of them were top 1 and 2 in the last season. They didn't mention Haaland because Haaland was joined Manchester City in this season, Mahrez and Kevin De Bruyne were carried Manchester City in the last year. They didn't mention Sterling because he already joined Chelsea.And Manchester United are the present information because they are comeback after Ronaldo was terminated.I guess you were right when you said chatGPT used data based on the previous season to predict the outcome of this season. And also I'm not sure if they have started to integrate recent knowledge into chatGPT because most of its knowledge is quite old. And because of that it might not be able to give an accurate prediction.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: If I'm not mistaken, the AI is a bit stupid in this case and anything that has anything to do with anything after the end of 2021, because it has data that only goes back to that period. At the moment when the AI is "online" in the sense that it has all possible data, then it will probably be able to give much more accurate and precise answers.This could be a problem for bookmakers, because players will have a very good tool for analyzing matches, and thus a greater chance of winning.

comments.author: coin.princess
comments.body: We really can't rely on the AI because their data is not updated as of current date some of them have a limited data and every season there's a lot of changes in team. There's a possibility that there's a changes in team and in management which would affect the performance of the team. For me, I think you really can't rely on the AI alone and you really can't base your bet because you think the AI have a point of what it is saying.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Humans can't be predicted by the machine, this makes human mind more greater and more powerful than AI, how will AI know how the team will perform in their next match? All AI have to rely on is the team's old performance data, which you and I know that old matches can't be used to predict the future upcoming matches. Sometimes, a team who have been losing matches will just decide to become more stronger and agile and it will shock everyone, this has happened too many times in soccer matches before. You can't or shouldn't rely on predictions from AI on games like the premier league, AI can't have information about who will be fit for the next matches and perform better, AI is not a God.

comments.author: ufaiz50
comments.body: Out of curiosity I did that too. There's a disclaimer that they don't have beliefs and opinion and what they do is just provide you an information which you can just get in the google for the description on that team and the other team but you know what? I would rather listen to the free tips I read online and get idea or information from it, rather than listening or believing to what an AI would say.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Don't trust Chat GPT for your gambling needs. It may supply you with incorrect information. Chat GPT is not always updated on current events, and most of the data it uses are from the past. If you're a gambler who wants to win, you need to do your own research (DYOR).You can ask Chat GPT for the history of a team, such as stats, as it may provide that information. However, when it comes to the chances of winning, which is what we're looking for, it certainly will not give you an accurate answer.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: I was laughing while reading this because I found it very funny. I started laughing from where I saw "Manchester City, Liverpool and Manchester United" as title contenders"Man City is a title contender but Liverpool and United? for real?  Liverpool are still fighting to make it to the Europa league while Man United are fighting to maintain their third position.Its obvious ChatGPT is not undated with the current happenings in the premier league. No mention of Arsenal as title contenders, No mention of Halland while mentioning City top players and also the inclusion of Sadio Mane for Liverpool tell you how outdated the information ChatGPT has it.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: I've read alot of funny responses from people and most times if AI was a person, I'm sure most persons would have beaten the hell out of it and one thing people have to understand is that this AI also made it very clear that it has no emotions or personal opinion and as such, it can't make any accurate predictions but it also stated that it will be making it's predictions based on collected data and available statistics and people also have to understand that we most times don't have to depend on AI but rather see it as a channel to making our own predictions.Well whatever the case might be, I still have to wonder why arsenal was skipped and I'm sure if same similar question is asked, ChatGPT will give a more precise answer.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: It seemed to me that if ChatGPT was not giving a definite answer. ChatGPT was only listing some clubs that might be potentially winning the game but if you are comparing with the fact if liverpool and manchester united have no chance to win EPL. City is the only candidate that already mentioned by chatGPT. It's likely that chatGPT was not able predicting who will be winning EPL. The correct answer shall be around Manchester city or Arsenal. Those clubs are the closest club to get EPL title this season. ChatGPT has no ability to predict the future. It was making an answer based on what already stored on its database. It's useless to ask chatGPT about which team that will potentially win EPL. Liverpool and Manchester united are performing so bad this season. ChatGPT needs to be update with the real time news related to the EPL team to make it even more accurate. I can't agree with what already said by that AI.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: I was amazed that you didn't mention Arsenal, after all they are the most likely team to be champions.Then I remembered that the AI data is not updated in real time "yet", so I asked chatGPT about the date myself, this is the answer:SourceWith data update only until September 2021, the AI can't do a good analysis.So we can conclude that for this kind of analysis or sports tips, it is not good to rely on AI. It has several things that can be useful, but it can't get the data of contracted players, eventual problems, injuries etc. to give a good hint.But it is an interesting exercise for learning and experience.When it is updated in real time, it can become a good ally to help predict something, but it is only really helpful for those who rely on statistics, for example if a certain game between two teams usually has many goals, or if a certain player has many chances to receive cards during the game.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on April 19, 2023, 08:44:18 AMStupid answer.Unbelievable that ChatGPT did not mention Erling Haaland when mentioning some Manchester City players as world class players.I am surprised not to see Arsenal among. Who is Manchester United and Liverpool this season when talking about Arsenal to win the league? The clubs are not just to be compared with Arsenal. Only Manchester City is mainly competing with Arsenal. Who to win 2022/2023 EPL: Arsenal or Manchester City. Between the AI and you I trust your logic and your analysis, AI very much depends on the past analysis provided by the internet and its database, but the human analysis is up to date and can do deep analysis Football is not my interest but you just provided a good insight and so we will see between you two, human and the AI who will come out with a perfect analysis.I always maintain that human has an insight that no AI can equal.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: First, ChatGPT is not a football guru who knows how to foresee the future. This is just a program that makes predictions based on the information received. Answers from ChatGPT should be perceived as some kind of fun and pampering.This answers offered by ChatGPT are completely erroneous. Except for Manchester City.Liverpool 100% will not win the cup this season. Even yesterday's devastating victory with 6 goals scored doesn't contribute to this.Manchester United will not 100% win the Premier League this season. Too big gap from the 2 main leaders on points.Manchester City can again become champions this season, because they have already succeeded more than once and Arsenal have lost too many points due to the last two draws, which gives Arsenal a high chance to overtake them.Arsenal (ChatGPT didn't even mention them) still have the opportunity to hold the lead until the end of the season and get the cup.Football is a very unpredictable sport, where an injury or replacement of even one main player can affect the future of the team, not to mention other factors that affect the outcome of each individual match and the entire tournament as a whole.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: ChatGPT only a AI bot which only collects information from various sources and provides it to a customer in a consolidated manner. ChatGPT makes a prediction considering only the scores according to the previous games of the clubs.  AI is just a robot with artificial intelligence it is not a player in the field so it is foolish to say or believe that its predictions will work 100%. you can make such predictions yourself.  Because you probably understand the game and watch the game

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: There are way too many factors AI can't explain. So, no it won't be able to predict the outcome on Premiere League, if it does it would only be some kind of coincidence kind of prediction. Well, we can't say AI will be the same this way in the coming years, it's being trained and could be more intelligent than ever.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on April 19, 2023, 02:17:18 PMit's being trained and could be more intelligent than ever.At the end of the day, it boils down to data availability and the algorithm used to train the machine. For example, they can easily feed past season data and then use recent form metrics to help people predict whether a team is going to win their next 5 matches or not, and so on. Someone can certainly develop that with enough time and money. Even if they become accurate, like, 90% (honestly doubt it), the gambling platform is still gonna make profits either way through one way or the other.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on April 19, 2023, 02:17:18 PMThere are way too many factors AI can't explain. So, no it won't be able to predict the outcome on Premiere League, if it does it would only be some kind of coincidence kind of prediction. Well, we can't say AI will be the same this way in the coming years, it's being trained and could be more intelligent than ever.AI now is everywhere and many industries are trying to integrate these AI's into their system, obviously because it is cost-effective but sports betting is something that is out of its reach, it can predict some games correctly but it cannot perfect the art of sports analysis, I'm sure these AI will not predict of upsets and will always rely on database provided information.But I never rule out that in the future they will try to be better so we'll see if there are comprehensive reports and predictions where the AI can accurately predict, and this will cause excitement for sports bettors.
